title: Liz The GM's Authortorium
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

**Hello, greetings, welcome, one and all!**

I am **Liz**, your humble GameMaster, here to entertain you with wild tales, frivolous games, and wicked tricks!  To tantalize your senses, tickle your funny bones, make you gasp in surprise and wheeze in delight!  Which, I am led to understand, is definitely a thing you wheeze in.

What's that?  You say I seem familiar but you're sure you've seen my various scribblings listed under a different name?  Well don't you worry, you're not going mad, it's just that my dead, old name has been erased from existence so that my new self could be born anew!

But you're not here for any of that ol' nonsense, are ya?  You're here for the //good stuff//, I know, I know, and here it is!

[[tabview]]
[[tab Articles and Tales in Order of Publication]]
**[[[SCP-3147]]]:** Tongue Twisted
**[[[SCP-3369]]]:** A Living Joke (co-authored with [[*user Aleph-Null]])
**[[[SCP-3408]]]:** Welcome to Site-3408
**[[[SCP-3053]]]:** Off the Rails
**[[[Liz The GM's Proposal | SCP-001]]]:** A Simple Toymaker
**[[[SCP-3284]]]:** Uncontainable
**[[[Unstoppable]]]**
**[[[SCP-6084]]]:** Dr. Wondertainment's Acoustically Astounding Air Band™
**[[[SCP-5463]]]:** New-Fangled Contraption
**[[[Document 3284/04C Draft]]]**
**[[[Freakuency Overture | Freakuency]]]**
[[/tab]]

-----
What's that you say?  You crave . . . //continuity?!//  Well fear not, for I do believe I have a few of those on hand!

[[tabview]]
[[tab The Ballad of Samantha Masters]]
D-2172, aka Samantha Masters, aka Sam, has been through a lot.  Follow her adventures both big and small as she tries to navigate her way through the dangerous world of Foundation employment!

**[[[SCP-3147]]]:** Tongue Twisted
**[[[SCP-3053]]]:** Off the Rails
**[[[SCP-3284]]]:** Uncontainable
**[[[Unstoppable]]]**
**[[[Document 3284/04C Draft]]]**
**[[[Freakuency Overture | Freakuency]]]**
[[/tab]]

[[tab The Happenings of Site-272]]
Just a short ways outside of the sleepy city of Broken Cliff, Missouri, sits a quiet little containment and research facility, Site-272.  Sam may be something of a Big Deal there, but she's not the only game in town!

**[[[SCP-3147]]]:** Tongue Twisted
**[[[SCP-3053]]]:** Off the Rails
**[[[SCP-3284]]]:** Uncontainable
**[[[Unstoppable]]]**
**[[[SCP-6084]]]:** Dr. Wondertainment's Acoustically Astounding Air Band™
**[[[SCP-5463]]]:** New-Fangled Contraption
**[[[Document 3284/04C Draft]]]**
**[[[Freakuency Overture | Freakuency]]]**
[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]

-----

Craving //more?//  Wish to see a tantalizing glimpse into the //future?//  Then why not pay a visit to my wondrous **[[[http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/liz-the-gm-s-imaginarium | Imaginarium]]]** to see what new stuff I'm in the process of brewing up?  You won't be disappointed!

Or maybe you will?  Who knows!  That's what makes it an //adventure!!!//
